hanzi-su-wiki:
責

Значения

Порицать, пытать, привлекать к ответственности; долг, обязанность

Мнемоника

Искажено. Вверху — терновник, растение 生 для порки. Деньги 貝 и наказание всегда рядом. Обвинять, выговор, наказывать.

Варианты

责
purpleculture_pinyin:
zé
duty; responsibility; to reproach; to blame
долг; обязанность; упрекать; обвинять

    • 貝 [ bèi ] sea shell; money, currency
heisig_chinese_memo: As one grows up, one typically starts to blame all of their problems on money instead of taking responsibility.
heisig_constituent: blame, grow up, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: As one grows up, one typically starts to blame all of their problems on money.
koohiiStory2: This is the story of a poor fisherman and his wife. A long time ago he caught an oyster with a small but precious pearl. The intelligent wife told him to sell the pearl immediately: the greedy husband figured if he kept the oyster and fed it, it would grow up and yield an even bigger pearl. One day the oyster grew so big, it crashed through the house and escaped back to sea. The angry wife left her husband, blaming his blind greed for their poverty.
jp_example_words:
責務(せきむ): duty, obligation
責任(せきにん): duty, responsibility
責める(せめる): condemn, blame, criticize
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Young people nowadays have an abnormal (looking) life, and they spend their shellfish (money) on things I don't like. So I blame them for everything that's wrong with the world today!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Darn those kids and their vidja games and their rap music. I blame them for everything! If they didn't eat so much avocado toasts I'd be able to have another mansion!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Those who blame everything on the people who live lives they don't recognize also seem to find them sexy (せき). Which is ridiculous if you think about it. How can you find someone sexy and then also judge everything they do and blame them for things?
WaniKani_Reading_Info: I dunno, I think there might be a lesson somewhere in this mnemonic, but you'll have to look really hard to see it.
Ru_Notes: Фонетик для нескольких кандзи: 積 (つむ、セキ объём, вместимость, произведение), 績 (セキ достижения).
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), ハ, 土 (земля), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Ru_trainchinese:
zé: (графема) обязанность, ответственность, долг
zé: (графема) винить; требовать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the shellfish (貝) with the master (龶) is tortured
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: After growing up people begin putting responsibility for their problems on shells (money).
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The inscriptions from " Bei " and "朿" sound, the original meaning is tax, and the extension is responsibility. "Said Wen": "Responsibility, beg. Cong Bei, Zheng Sheng."

There are two meanings in the golden text. First, it means that the ruler pays tribute to the taxes collected by the subjects, and the tax is the responsibility of the subjects, which leads to the meaning of responsibility. Xi Jia Pan: "Wang Ling Jia Zheng (Zheng) will be responsible for Nanhuai corpses (Yi) on Thursday", which means that Wang Ling Xi Jia collected taxes from the world to Cheng Zhou to reach Nan Huai Yi. " Responsibility " is used in the classics as " accumulation ", which means renting the Jiamihe in the Gongna, "Zuo Zhuan. "Thirty-three Years of Xi Gong": "You have a day's accumulation". Du pre-note: "Accumulation: 蒭, rice, vegetables, salary." (see Ma Chengyuan, Li Xueqin) 2. Passing vacation is " ji " and " ji ", Qin Gonggui: "Yu Zhai Yu responsibilities (trace)", "Yu trace" is the place where Yu passed. "Zuo Zhuan. "The Four Years of Xianggong": "Mangmangyu Remains, painted as Kyushu." (See Yang Shuda).
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The inscriptions from " Bei " and "朿" sound, the original meaning is tax, and the extension is responsibility.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「貝」，「朿」聲，本義是賦稅，引申為責任。《說文》：「責，求也。从貝，朿聲。」

　　金文用義有二，一、表示統治者對臣民所收的賦稅納貢，賦稅為臣民之責任，由此引申出責任之意。兮甲盤：「王令甲政(征)治成周四方責至于南淮尸(夷)」，表示王令兮甲征收天下貢於成周的賦稅，到達南淮夷。「責」典籍作「積」，表示租賦貢納中的蒭米禾薪，《左傳．僖公三十三年》：「居則具一日之積」杜預注：「積：蒭、米、菜、薪。」(參馬承源、李學勤)二、通假為「迹」、「蹟」，秦公簋：「鼏宅禹責(蹟)」，「禹蹟」即禹所經過之處。《左傳．襄公四年》：「芒芒禹迹，畫為九州。」(參楊樹達)。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「貝」，「朿」聲，本義是賦稅，引申為責任。

①分內應做的事：責任。盡責。負責。職責。專責。責無旁貸。
②要求：責求。責令。責成。
③指摘過失：責備。責怪。斥責。責罰。譴責。
④質問，詰問：責問。責難。責讓。
⑤舊指爲了懲罰而打：鞭責。杖責。

金文從「 貝 」，「 朿 」聲，本義是賦稅，引申為責任。《說文》：「責，求也。从貝，朿聲。」 金文用義有二，一、表示統治者對臣民所收的賦稅納貢，賦稅為臣民之責任，由此引申出責任之意。兮甲盤：「王令甲政(征)治成周四方責至于南淮尸(夷)」，表示王令兮甲征收天下貢於成周的賦稅，到達南淮夷。「 責 」典籍作「 積 」，表示租賦貢納中的蒭米禾薪，《左傳．僖公三十三年》：「居則具一日之積」杜預注：「積：蒭、米、菜、薪。」(參馬承源、李學勤)二、通假為「 迹 」、「 蹟 」，秦公簋：「鼏宅禹責(蹟)」，「禹蹟」即禹所經過之處。《左傳．襄公四年》：「芒芒禹迹，畫為九州。」(參楊樹達)。
Elaboration: The inscriptions from " Bei" and " 朿" sound, the original meaning is tax, and the extension is responsibility. "Said Wen": "Responsibility, beg. Cong Bei, Zheng Sheng." There are two meanings in the golden text. First, it means that the ruler pays tribute to the taxes collected by the subjects, and the tax is the responsibility of the subjects, which leads to the meaning of responsibility. Xi Jia Pan: "Wang Ling Jia Zheng (Zheng) will be responsible for Nanhuai corpses (Yi) on Thursday", which means that Wang Ling Xi Jia collected taxes from the world to Cheng Zhou to reach Nan Huai Yi. " Responsibility" is used in the classics as " accumulation", which means renting the Jiamihe in the Gongna, "Zuo Zhuan. "Thirty-three Years of Xi Gong": "You have a day's accumulation". Du pre-note: "Accumulation: 蒭, rice, vegetables, salary." (see Ma Chengyuan, Li Xueqin) 2. Passing vacation is " ji" and " ji", Qin Gonggui: "Yu Zhai Yu responsibilities (trace)", "Yu trace" is the place where Yu passed. "Zuo Zhuan. "The Four Years of Xianggong": "Mangmangyu Remains, painted as Kyushu." (See Yang Shuda).

責字的基本解释

責
zé

責
zhài
均见“责”。

責字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zé］
［《廣韻》側革切，入麥，莊。］
“債1”的古字。“责1”的繁体字。
(1)索取，求取。
(2)要求；期望。
(3)责令，督促。
(4)谴责，责备。
(5)指诘问。
(6)惩处、处罚。
(7)特指鞭扑，责打。
(8)贬谪。
(9)责任，职责。
(10)特指罪责。
(11)谓立下或写下。
(12)见“責責”。
(13)通“積”。聚积。
[②]［zhài］
［《集韻》側賣切，去卦，莊。］
“责2”的繁体字。
“債”的古字。

責字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　責； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1205第19
〔古文〕?【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】側革切【正韻】側格切，?音窄。【說文】求也。【左傳·桓十三年】宋多責賂於鄭。　又非也。【書·君奭】誕無我責。【傳】汝大無非責我留。　又誅責也。【詩·邶風·旄丘序】責衞伯也。【禮·表記】君子與其有諾責也，寧有己怨。【疏】責，謂許而不與而被責。　又責讓也。【左傳·僖十五年】西鄰責言，不可償也。【註】微刺也。　又任也。【孟子】有言責者。　又取也。【戰國策】歸其劒而責之金。　又問也。【史記·周勃世家】吏簿責條侯。【註】簿問其辭情。　又自訟也。【前漢·韓延壽傳】痛自刻責。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?側賣切。與債同。【周禮·天官·小宰】聽稱責以傅別。【註】稱責，謂貸子。【疏】謂舉責生子，彼此俱爲稱意，故曰稱責也。【左傳·成十八年】施舍已責。【註】止逋責。　又叶側棘切。【柳宗元·懲咎賦】旣明懼夫天討兮，又幽慄兮鬼責。惶惶兮夜寤而晝駭兮，類麏䴥之不息。

考證：〔【禮·表記】君子與有諾責也〕

responsibility

responsibility
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zé］
["Guangyun" side leather cut, into wheat, Zhuang. ]
An ancient word for "Debt 1". Traditional characters for "responsibility 1".
(1) Ask for, ask for.
(2) Requirements; expectations.
(3) Order and urge.
(4) Condemnation, blame.
(5) Refers to cross-examination.
(6) Punishment and punishment.
(7) Especially refer to whip and beat.
(8) Relegation.
(9) Responsibility, responsibility.
(10) Special accusation.
(11) It means to set up or write down.
(12) See "Responsibility".
(13) Through "product". accumulate.
[②]［zhài］
["Ji Yun" sells cut sideways, goes to Gua, Zhuang. ]
Traditional characters for "responsibility 2".
The ancient word for "debt".
responsibility
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Beijing Department] 　responsibilities; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 1205 Page 19
〔古文〕?【Guangyun】【Jiyun】【Yunhui】lateral leather cut 【Zhengyun】side grid cut, narrow sound. [Said Wen] Please also. [Zuo Zhuan·Thirteenth Year of Huan] Song Duo blamed Zheng.　Neither. 【Book·Junshi】I have no responsibility for the birthday. [Biography] Ru Da blames me to stay.　It's also condemned. 【Poetry·Bei Feng·Hanqiu Preface】Bao Wei is also responsible. [Ritual·Table Records] Gentlemen would rather have their own grievances than they have promises and responsibilities. 【Sparse】Responsibility means to be blamed for not agreeing.　I also blamed it. [Zuo Zhuan·Xi Fifteen Years] Xilin's reproach is irreparable. 【Note】Small thorns are also.　 Ren Ye. [Mencius] Those who have the blame.　Take it again. [Warring States Policy] The money that belongs to him and who is responsible.　 asked again. [Historical Records·Zhou Bo Family] Official Accounts Responsibilities. [Note] The book asked about his resignation.　 Also self-sue. [Previous Han·Han Yanshou Biography] Pain and blame yourself.　 [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun]? Side selling and cutting. Same as debt. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Xiao Zai】Farewell to the blame. [Note] Responsibility is called a loan. 【Shu】It means that the responsibility of giving birth to children is complimented by each other, so it is also called blame. [Zuo Zhuan·Eighteen Years] Alms have been responsible. [Note] Stop responsibilities.　The leaf side spine is cut again. 【Liu Zongyuan·Punish and Blame Fu】He was afraid of his husband’s day to beg, but also lied to ghosts. Anxious at night and horrified at day, the likeness is endless. Textual research: [[Ritual·Table Records] Gentlemen and Promises and Responsibilities]

zé, zhài
вм. 责
Radicals: 生, 貝  (life, shellfish)
Meaning Mnemonic
Young people nowadays have an abnormal (looking) life, and they spend their shellfish (money) on things I don't like. So I blame them for everything that's wrong with the world today!
Darn those kids and their vidja games and their rap music. I blame them for everything! If they didn't eat so much avocado toasts I'd be able to have another mansion!
Reading Mnemonic
Those who blame everything on the people who live lives they don't recognize also seem to find them sexy (せき). Which is ridiculous if you think about it. How can you find someone sexy and then also judge everything they do and blame them for things?
I dunno, I think there might be a lesson somewhere in this mnemonic, but you'll have to look really hard to see it.
